duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive, prepare, and maintain product, floor, displays, and back stock in accordance with company standards.
Ensure product quality meets company standards and accurately sort and scan waste.
Maintain production standards and stock shelved and food preparation areas.
Handle invoices for product delivered outside store receiving hours and check-in product to the sales floor or back stock spaces.
Provide excellent customer service, address customer needs, and model suggestive selling techniques.
Maximize sales potential through effective procedures for product preparation, storage, rotation, stocking, and merchandising.
Maintain a clean and sanitary working and shopping environment and ensure equipment meets cleanliness and safety standards.
Perform opening, mid, and closing duties as assigned and report safety hazards and violations.
Perform other duties as assigned by store, regional, or national leadership.
